0: Seems like an older well maintained hotel with a boutique renovation upgrade
A maintenance man was sent in and stayed there fixing the leak until midnight leaky ac
When the maintenance man arrived he could not get it to work either
They do not have a lot to offer beds not comfortable bathroom in need of new ceiling tiles and a good scrubbing of counter top
Over all just a very disappointing stay Not very much Gas Lamp area is within walking distance but next time I had stay elsewhere Bathrooms need updating
The decor was okay but one of the most exciting things was that while I was staying here they were making plans for renovating the hotel
Some floors being renovated but no noise at night
Recently updated room except for the bathroom
Memo to hotel management next time you renovate get double pane glass for the outdoor windows at least on lower floors
1: newly refurbished room excellent very comfortable and quiet
The new remodel is coming along great
The room itself is very updated contemporary and stylish
Fresh refurbished bedrooms were very comfortable
Upscale hotel with newly renovated rooms
room and bath area were clean and house keeping totally refreshed the room for second day
My husbands Bike broke down and the parking attendants and maintenance staff were very helpful and even offered to help jump start his bike
Updated hotel in a great location
it was a very nice big renovated room with a big tv screen and big and very clean bathroom
